metadata.title: Six Cats Under - A Captivating Puzzle Adventure
metadata.description: Discover 'Six Cats Under', a charming point-and-click puzzle game where you use poltergeist powers to rescue your herd of cats. Rated 4.8/5 by players.
metadata.keywords: Six Cats Under, puzzle game, point-and-click, cat rescue game, game jam, ghost powers, Six Cats Under ratings

hero.p: Immerse yourself in 'Six Cats Under', a delightful point-and-click puzzle game where your poltergeist powers help guide your beloved cats to safety.

gameFeatures.title: Game Features
features: Perfect for cat lovers and puzzle enthusiasts
Short and sweet gaming experience, ideal for quick sessions

gameplayInstructions.title: How to Play Six Cats Under
instructions: Use your mouse to interact with objects and guide your cats.
Utilize poltergeist abilities to move items and open pathways.
Solve puzzles to advance through the levels and rescue all the cats.
Pay attention to visual clues and hints throughout the game.
Enjoy the narrative and charming interactions with your feline friends.

reviews.content: A lovely game! Great animations and utterly adorable cats.
reviews.author: surpriseregularly

reviews.content: As a cat owner, this game resonates deeply. An absolute gem!
reviews.author: gecko

reviews.content: An adorably sweet game... poor Goldy! Heartwarming yet emotional.
reviews.author: magerites

reviews.content: Unique puzzles and so many adorable moments. Loved it!
reviews.author: DLGames

reviews.content: The blend of cuteness and a touch of sadness makes this game stand out.
reviews.author: pitchfrank

reviews.content: Fantastic game! Finished it in 15 minutes, loved every moment.
reviews.author: MCG

reviews.content: Both adorable and sad but really fun! Great experience overall.
reviews.author: nierlathotep

reviews.content: The cats are adorable and the ghostly helper aspect is unique. Highly recommend!
reviews.author: CatDadGaming

questions.question: What platforms is Six Cats Under available on?
questions.answer: Six Cats Under is available on HTML5, Windows, macOS, and Linux.

questions.question: How long does it take to complete the game?
questions.answer: The average session lasts about a half-hour, providing a quick but enjoyable experience.

questions.question: Is 'Six Cats Under' suitable for all ages?
questions.answer: Yes, the game is designed to be enjoyed by players of all ages, especially cat lovers.

questions.question: What are the minimum requirements to run the game?
questions.answer: The game is lightweight and can run on most systems supporting HTML5 or the respective OS versions.

questions.question: Can the game be played offline?
questions.answer: The downloadable versions for Windows, macOS, and Linux can be played offline after installation.

questions.question: Who developed 'Six Cats Under'?
questions.answer: The game was developed by Team Bean Loop and Mosu, with contributions from Miles Äijälä, Robin Swift, Tomas Beržinskas, and Alex Martin.
